Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

A satsis pod falls in front of the Maximals base. At the same time, Deemos =
and his group are repaired and come from the CR Chamber, their wounds were =
fatal but not major. The 6 of them sport a different paint job, all 6 of th=
em are purple, black, and white now. Deemos and his group go outside and se=
e the pod. Deemos gives the thumbs up to His comrades. They start to progra=
m it.

"Name?" Deemos asked.

"It says the name is...Tint." Rizopas says. D=
eemos's smile is huge.

"Make the name Doom Ice, you can do that, if she wa=
s dumb enough to escape in a stasis pod, we reprogram her!" Deemos said.

"=
Isn't that what we are against?" Artist asked.

"No, Artist, it's not, we a=
re just trying to make more bots good!" Deemos replied. Airbomber walks up =
and sees the pod.

"What are you guys doing with the pod?" He asked. Sudden=
ly, every one of Deemos' group members had a blaster stuck in Airbomber's f=
ace.

"I say we kill him!" Blender said.

"I say we make him join us in our=
 fight!" Diskus said.

"For once your intelligent, Diskus!" Stronghold said=
. Airbomber is sweating now, he didn't know what that meant but it scared h=
im. Deemos came up from behind him. (Don't know if Infectra is there, but I=
 assume she is, if she's not then tell me) Stronghold and Blender target In=
fectra. Deemos starts to pump some phony info into his mind with the device=
, and bam! He already looks serious.

"Infectra, you might as well leave." =
Deemos said.

"I will join you, you guys are right, we do need less violenc=
e, the war must end, and if there must be a war to end the war, so be it!" =
Airbomber said. He turns back to Infectra.

"Do not worry, Infectra, I stil=
l love you, you don't have to leave." Airbomber said. Deemos laughed and ru=
bbed his hands together as Rizopas reprograms Tint and makes her Doom Ice. =
Doom Ice is first seen now, she stands and looks around. Deemos is in a new=
 form, but she reconizes him. But, she has no fear, he seems different. She=
 knew of their war, she didn't know how, but she knew. (Reprogrammed and me=
mory addage while she was asleep)

"I shall join you." Doom Ice said. Deemo=
s looked at his growing group, A few more and he'll rule the Neo Beast Wars=
! It's a sure thing! He thought. He had 8 now, and it felt pretty good. Doo=
m Ice didn't remember Land Mine a single bit, and remembered Deemos as your=
 lord and almighty leader.

"For the Maximals, and everyone's protection an=
d peace! Until all...are one!" Deemos shouted. Doom Ice and Airbomber's han=
ds were raised and the 8 of them raised their hands high in the air. Airbom=
ber waved for Infectra to do it to, not caring about what she thought of th=
is group...
